Text: Thank you ... the game works perfectly

Hello. I downloaded this game less than 12 hours ago and played it without any problems. I shut down my computer when I got down to the last 4 stages. Now when I try to play Rio again, I get an error message: "Failed to open /Applications/Angry Birds Rio.app/Contents/Resources/data/images/PC/THEME_4_CARNIVAL_1.png

Is this happening to anyone else? How might I fix this problem?
it working now too after I restart my Mac
